title: I'M JUST TIRED OF FIXING THIS PROBLEM....UN-BOXING SOME HANDY FARM GOODIES AND MORE!!

tasks.task: Check on goats and address hay feeding issues
subtasks: Identify and move hay spread by goats
Construct a mobile enclosure (goat mobile) for better hay management
Fix fence bindings caused by hay accumulation

tasks.task: Unbox and prepare equipment for lawnmower repair
subtasks: Remove debris and contaminants from work area
Jack up and remove front wheels from zero turn mower
Investigate and resolve wheel bearing issues
Replace flat inner tubes and service lawnmower tires
Plan and prepare for future mower maintenance

tasks.task: Install and test new tools and attachments on Gator UTV
subtasks: Attach double rhino clips for equipment storage
Mount ratcheting coplin grips for tool security
Evaluate and secure heavy-duty magnetic hooks in steel building
Try on and assess new farming overalls

tasks.task: Prepare the goat pen for efficient livestock management
subtasks: Design and start construction of the goat mobile
Remove debris resulting from recent storms
Fortify fencing against future storm damage

tasks.task: Monitor and plan for controlled field burning
subtasks: Assess pasture areas for optimal field rotation
Coordinate goat relocation to prepare for burning
Prepare fire safety measures for upcoming burns
